choices.A: The higher the difference score, the more the attributes differ between the two segments.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
A and B

Correct - A and B
Segment differentiators help you find out what differentiates a segment from the rest of your customers or from another segment. 
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-insights/segment-insights#segment-differentiators

Run a differentiator analysis
Go to Segments and select the Insights (preview) tab.

Select New and choose the Differentiators option in the Choose Insight Type pane.

Choose the segment you want to analyze as Primary segment and select Next.

Choose All customers or a Secondary segment to compare your primary segment with and select Next.

Optionally, choose one or more fields of interest to focus the analysis on specific attributes and select Next.

Provide a name for you differentiator analysis, an optional display name, and a description.

Select Save to start the analysis. The differentiator analysis is ready when the status changes from Refreshing to Successful.
